original_title: 味噌カレー牛乳ラーメンってめぇ〜の？
overview: A high school girl living in Aomori Prefecture who loves subcultures struggles to choose between the path of being the successor of "Itako" and the path of living in Tokyo, which she longs for. Then, she develops a friendship with the spirit of the fox who possessed her by chance, and while getting involved in her surroundings, she overcomes various difficulties and grows as a slapstick coming-of-age comedy.
title: What is Miso Curry Milk Ramen?
